short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically find Best Price / Coupons for any Product / Service while you Browse

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do a real time price comparison on your next product when shopping online. GrabShack is a search engine to compare prices across Flipkart, Amazon, Snapdeal, Paytm, Shopclues and many more. 

Get most out of your online shopping with GrabShack to get offers and price comparison from over 500 online stores:

1. Automatically get prices from different shopping websites while you are shopping.
2. Automatically get coupons for any website eg. Pizzahut, Dominos, First Cry and many more.
3. Get latest trending offers.
4. Customize extension for maximum savings.

“The startup uses AI to understand the semantics of websites along with the relations a product has with its pricing, discounts, etc and leverages those relations to find out the best deal (or coupon) available across any e-commerce site.”
- Times Of India

“GrabShack: A one-stop website to shop from the internet”
- Deccan Chronicle

“GrabShack looks into all the e-commerce websites and instantly understands what is happening (like Siri of iPhone). The startup uses its own semantics engine to relate the user and the product they want from different websites.”
- The New Indian Express
